alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:09PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Carter County through 345 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ekalaka. The storm was drifting slowly northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of water along roadways. Locations impacted include... Ekalaka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
